name: Tank Bang - 4 Player Online Shooter
description:
Tired of slow-paced actions? Tank-Bang gives you one hell of a multiplayer action experience! Challenge the other team in this 4-player top-down shooter and destroy their tanks before they destroy yours.

Good Luck!

THIS IS AN EARLY PROTOTYPE THAT IS STILL IN DEVELOPMENT. I AM TRYING OUT ONLINE MECHANICS TO IMPROVE THE CONNECTION AND USER EXPERIENCE.

Thank you for sharing your experience with me, it will help me with the development.
